bantam.cfg

Class UnaryNegInst

  • java.lang.Object
    • bantam.cfg.TACInst
      • bantam.cfg.UnaryInst
        • bantam.cfg.UnaryNegInst

  • public class UnaryNegInst
extends UnaryInst
    A class representing a three-address code unary integer negation instruction (UnaryNegInst). A unary negation instruction consists of a destination variable and a source variable (inherited from UnaryInst). From TACInst it also inherits an opcode (UNNEG).
    Author:
    Marc Corliss and Lori Pietraszek
